column3:
“I happened to run by some of this at my local dispensary. I tend to enjoy sativa more than indica, you could say I'm a purest. This is one of the best I have ever laid my eyes on. The terpines are monumental! It is so sweet! In combination with the lemon it taste almost like pineapple. My batch was quite heavy by any standards @ 27% active thc. This is one to keep your eye out for. For sure. 

--Dallin”

“Looks amazing, smells amazing.

Smoke is so nice and smooth with a full body, and I love the taste too.The high isn't overpowering at all and I feel relaxed, peaceful, and can smoke it at any time of the day and be ok.

Very very good strain.”
“Excellent one of the best sativas I have enjoyed lately.”

“Perfect for beginners and a comfortable high for experienced users. The sweet fruity smells make the smoking experience quite pleasant. Your high will keep you present yet elated. Wonderful for working on creative projects and outdoor activities.”
“Great strain. Looks amazing tastes great! Definitly one to grab is you can find. Rare strain”
“Looks,tastes,smells great and gets you high as hell!!!”
“Really nice sativa hybrid! Super clear headed and uplifting high. The perfect day time smoke for fatigue and depression.”
“Simply one of the, if not the best strains I’ve ever tried. Very fruity and citrusy taste with an amazing uplifting and energetic high. Great for daytime use, especially outdoors.”
